comments:
I got this error when reopening a ticket through Mylyn (ticket system is TRAC).

-- Error Log --
Date: Tue Nov 06 11:59:01 GMT 2007
Message: Invoke TracCorePlugin.toStatus(Throwable, TaskRepository)
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylyn
Stack Trace:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Invoke TracCorePlugin.toStatus(Throwable, TaskRepository)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracCorePlugin.toStatus(TracCorePlugin.java:93)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracTaskDataHandler.postTaskData(TracTaskDataHandler.java:343)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.editors.AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor$37.run(AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.java:2754)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
Caused by: org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracPermissionDeniedException
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracXmlRpcClient.callInternal(TracXmlRpcClient.java:174)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracXmlRpcClient.call(TracXmlRpcClient.java:127)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracXmlRpcClient.validate(TracXmlRpcClient.java:226)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracXmlRpcClient.updateAPIVersion(TracXmlRpcClient.java:244)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracXmlRpcClient.updateTicket(TracXmlRpcClient.java:610)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.trac.core.TracTaskDataHandler.postTaskData(TracTaskDataHandler.java:339)
... 2 more

This has been fixed in the latest version of Mylyn which is distributed from the weekly update site:

 http://www.eclipse.org/mylyn/downloads/
 
Please reopen this bug if the problem persists with the latest version.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 195038 ***
